    • Uses of FederationManagement in org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.federation

      Classes in org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.federation that implement FederationManagement 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DistributedFederationManagement
      This extension of LocalFederationManagement allows additionally to the local administration an administration on remote hosts using SSH.
      class  LocalFederationManagement
      This implementation of FederationManagement allows local administration only.
